stimulusHtml: Which of the following describes the relationship between price and quantity supplied according to the law of supply?
choicesHtml: Positive relationship, illustrated by an upward-sloping supply curve
Positive relationship, illustrated by a downward-sloping supply curve
Positive relationship, illustrated by a horizontal supply curve
Negative relationship, illustrated by an upward-sloping supply curve
Negative relationship, illustrated by a downward-sloping supply curve
